Title: Prohibits foreign banking corporations from issuing payday loans
Summary: Prohibits foreign banking corporations from issuing payday loans; defines payday loans as any transaction in which a short-term cash advance is made to a consumer in exchange for (i) a consumer's personal check or share draft, in the amount of an advance plus a fee, where presentment or negotiation of such check or share draft is deferred by agreement of the parties until a designated future date; or (ii) a consumer's authorization to debit the consumer's transaction account, in the amount of the advance plus a fee, where such account will be debited on or after a designated future date.
LawCode: Add ยง202-k, Bank L; add ยง5-532, Gen Ob L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the banking law and the general obligations law, in relation to prohibiting foreign banking corporations from engaging in high-cost payday loans
